sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section is being considered for removal.** This article or section is being considered for removal.

This article or section is being considered for removal.

Convert may refer to:

- converting text file formats line breaks with dos2unix character encodings with iconv, uconv(1) or recode
- converting documents
- converting media file formats image processing tools audio converters video converters
- the convert command of ImageMagick used to convert images
- these articles: Convert any Movie to DVD Video Convert a single drive system to RAID Convert ext2/ext3 partitions to ext4

- line breaks with dos2unix
- character encodings with iconv, uconv(1) or recode

- image processing tools
- audio converters
- video converters

- Convert any Movie to DVD Video
- Convert a single drive system to RAID
- Convert ext2/ext3 partitions to ext4
